sentence.Network_en: The chance that an electron absorbs more than one photon is negligible.
sentence.Network_cn: 一个电子吸收一个以上的光子的机会是极少的.

sentence.Network_en: A photon leaving the sun will be " retarded " by the sun's gravity.
sentence.Network_cn: 离开太阳的光子因受太阳引力而 “ 减速 ”.

sentence.Network_en: When a photon collides with a molecule, several things can happen.
sentence.Network_cn: 当光子与一个分子碰撞时, 可发生几种情况.

derivation.yuyuan_name: early 20th cent.: from Greek phōs, phōt- 'light', on the pattern of electron

entry.def: A photon is a particle of light.

means.word_mean: 1. a quantum of electromagnetic radiation; an elementary particle that is its own antiparticle
